overview:
Born in Detroit, Michigan in 1981, Ryan Meray studied computer science and graphic arts before founding C! Tech Solutions in 2005. His passion for technology, attention to detail, and communication skills have contributed to his success in providing computer service and consulting to small business and home users.

Ryan lives in Ferndale and serves on the Board of Directors for the Ferndale Chamber of Commerce. Ryan is a tech enthusiast, dabbles in social networking and marketing, and is a diehard fan of Ferndale and Metro Detroit.
